data.name: AsyncFlowAndESInteropNotSupported
data.value: TransactionScope with TransactionScopeAsyncFlowOption.Enabled option is not supported when the TransactionScope is used within Enterprise Service context with Automatic or Full EnterpriseServicesInteropOption enabled in parent scope.

data.name: BadAsyncResult
data.value: The IAsyncResult parameter must be the same parameter returned by BeginCommit.

data.name: BadResourceManagerId
data.value: Resource Manager Identifiers cannot be Guid.Empty.

data.name: CannotPromoteSnapshot
data.value: Transactions with IsolationLevel Snapshot cannot be promoted.

data.name: CannotSetCurrent
data.value: Current cannot be set directly when Com+ Interop is enabled.

data.name: ConfigInvalidTimeSpanValue
data.value: Valid TimeSpan values are greater than TimeSpan.Zero.

data.name: CurrentDelegateSet
data.value: The delegate for an external current can only be set once.

data.name: DisposeScope
data.value: The current TransactionScope is already complete. You should dispose the TransactionScope.

data.name: EnlistmentStateException
data.value: The operation is not valid for the current state of the enlistment.

data.name: EsNotSupported
data.value: Com+ Interop features cannot be supported.

data.name: InternalError
data.value: Internal Error

data.name: InvalidArgument
data.value: The argument is invalid.

data.name: InvalidIPromotableSinglePhaseNotificationSpecified
data.value: The specified IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification is not the same as the one provided to EnlistPromotableSinglePhase.

data.name: InvalidRecoveryInformation
data.value: Transaction Manager in the Recovery Information does not match the configured transaction manager.

data.name: InvalidScopeThread
data.value: A TransactionScope must be disposed on the same thread that it was created.

data.name: PromotionFailed
data.value: There was an error promoting the transaction to a distributed transaction.

data.name: PromotedReturnedInvalidValue
data.value: The Promote method returned an invalid value for the distributed transaction.

data.name: PromotedTransactionExists
data.value: The transaction returned from Promote already exists as a distributed transaction.

data.name: TooLate
data.value: It is too late to add enlistments to this transaction.

data.name: TraceTransactionTimeout
data.value: Transaction Timeout

data.name: TransactionAborted
data.value: The transaction has aborted.

data.name: TransactionAlreadyCompleted
data.value: DependentTransaction.Complete or CommittableTransaction.Commit has already been called for this transaction.

data.name: TransactionIndoubt
data.value: The transaction is in doubt.

data.name: TransactionManagerCommunicationException
data.value: Communication with the underlying transaction manager has failed.

data.name: TransactionScopeComplete
data.value: The current TransactionScope is already complete.

data.name: TransactionScopeIncorrectCurrent
data.value: Transaction.Current has changed inside of the TransactionScope.

data.name: TransactionScopeInvalidNesting
data.value: TransactionScope nested incorrectly.

data.name: TransactionScopeIsolationLevelDifferentFromTransaction
data.value: The transaction specified for TransactionScope has a different IsolationLevel than the value requested for the scope.

data.name: TransactionScopeTimerObjectInvalid
data.value: TransactionScope timer object is invalid.

data.name: TransactionStateException
data.value: The operation is not valid for the state of the transaction.

data.name: UnexpectedFailureOfThreadPool
data.value: There was an unexpected failure of QueueUserWorkItem.

data.name: UnexpectedTimerFailure
data.value: There was an unexpected failure of a timer.

data.name: UnrecognizedRecoveryInformation
data.value: The RecoveryInformation provided is not recognized by this version of System.Transactions.

data.name: VolEnlistNoRecoveryInfo
data.value: Volatile enlistments do not generate recovery information.

data.name: DistributedTxIDInTransactionException
data.value: {0} Distributed Transaction ID is {1}

data.name: PromoterTypeInvalid
data.value: The specified PromoterType is invalid.

data.name: PromoterTypeUnrecognized
data.value: There is a promotable enlistment for the transaction which has a PromoterType value that is not recognized by System.Transactions. {0}

data.name: DistributedNotSupported
data.value: This platform does not support distributed transactions.
